markdownRemark.excerpt: Broadcasting from the Zurich area, Switzerland, Eve Lyn captures moods from nature and the audience and turns them into dance music ! A resident with Portugal's athmospheric label Octo Records, her downtempo style is shaped by sounds, and melodies by landscapes, rhythms and voices of all kinds of places around the world. Put your headphones on and chill... Follow Eve Lyn on Soundcloud / Facebook…
markdownRemark.html:
Broadcasting from the Zurich area, Switzerland, Eve Lyn captures moods from nature and the audience and turns them into dance music !

A resident with Portugal's athmospheric label Octo Records, her downtempo style is shaped by sounds, and melodies by landscapes, rhythms and voices of all kinds of places around the world.

Put your headphones on and chill...

The Asymetrics · The Asymetrics Present: Eve Lyn - Pier Into Clouds

Follow Eve Lyn on Soundcloud / Facebook


Stay Fesh, and Keep Traveling !

frontmatter.author: Asymetrics
frontmatter.teaser: On a mission to spread love and joy, Eve Lyn graces the Asymetrics with just the right vibe !
frontmatter.title: Eve Lyn - Pier Into Clouds
